mapper.select: select s2.goodsDetail_no,g.name,imgPath,allergy,origin,price,calorie from ( select * from ( select gd.*,Row_Number() Over(PARTITION by goods_no order by gs.sort desc) as rn from goods_Detail gd inner join goods_size gs on gd.goodssize_no = gs.goodssize_no ) s1 where rn = 1 ) s2 inner join goods g on s2.goods_no = g.goods_no where g.category_no = ( select category_no from ( select rownum rn,s1.* from ( select category_no from category where menuType_no = #{menuType_no} order by menuType_no ) s1 ) s2 where s2.rn = (#{cateRowNum}-1) ) order by g.sort
